name: Colorful Dash
description:
This game was made for the MiniJam 62 game jam.

Walk on the right color or you will lose a life.

Watch out for the timer, you can gain time by walking on the right color.

You can change your color by clicking on the desired color at the cost of a life.

You can skip a row by clicking on one of the skips on the right.

You can collect a life from the blocks themselves.
